StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateProgram_Unassign]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ProgramAvailabilityID int, @LastEditBy varchar(50) ) AS
UPDATE PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY SET CONTRACT_ID = null, NWA_ID = null, PROGRAM_ASSIGNMENT_DATE = null, USER_LOGIN = @LastEditBy, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID = @ProgramAvailabilityID
